description: This is a view which is used to derive aggregated harsh event counts for customer 360 per org_id

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: This Internal ID for the customer's Samsara org

schema.name: sam_number
schema.description: This is the internal Samsara Customer ID

schema.name: haaccel
schema.description: The aggregated number of harsh acceleration events for the org_id on a given day

schema.name: habraking
schema.description: The aggregated number of harsh braking events for the org_id on a given day

schema.name: hasharpturn
schema.description: The aggregated number of harsh sharp turn events for the org_id on a given day

schema.name: hacrash
schema.description: The aggregated number of harsh crash events for the org_id on a given day

schema.name: hadistracteddriving
schema.description: The aggregated number of harsh distracted driving events for the org_id on a given day

schema.name: hatailgating
schema.description: The aggregated number of harsh tailgating events for the org_id on a given day
